Job DescriptionAre you curious, motivated, and forward-thinking? At FIS you’ll have the opportunity to work on some of the most challenging and relevant issues in financial services and technology. Our talented people empower us, and we believe in being part of a team that is open, collaborative, entrepreneurial, passionate and above all fun.About the teamYou will be part of the Client Success team within International Markets and will work closely with peers within the Client Success team, as well as with other stakeholders and functional partners within FIS’s functional matrix model.This role will provide hands on leadership of all automation testing activities, identifying the best fit tools for the planned scope of automation testing.  Role is required to have extensive Automation testing experience and familiarity with cards processing and/or card-based payment Processing.What you will be doing:Reviewing and analysis of Non-Functional requirements and specifications.
Designing and scripting test cases using in-depth technical analysis.
Execution of tests and recording of results in the form of test reports.
Develop, document and maintain test artefacts like the test data, data validation, harness scripts and automated scripts.
Integration with defect reporting and results presentation tools.
Note defects or trends and the possible causes.What you bring:Knowledge of methods, tools and technology used across full suite of Performance/Non-Functional testing (performance, usability, scalability, stability, resilience, disaster recovery, etc).
Knowledge of defect management tools.
Knowledge and Experience of automated test tools.
Knowledge of functions, features and components of existing and planned operating systems and applications.
Maintaining robust and cohesive automated suites of tests across different types of environments.
Skill in analysis, solid decision-making and problem solving.
Ability to collaborate with delivery teams.
Ability to communicate effectively verbally and in writing.
Ability to establish and maintain effective working relationships with colleagues.Added bonus if you have:Knowledge of FIS’ products and services
Knowledge of financial services industry
Knowledge of basic financial analysis principles and ratios What we offer you:An exciting opportunity be a part of World’s Leading FinTech Product MNC
To be a part of vibrant team and to build up a career on core banking/payments domain
Competitive salary and attractive benefits including GHMI/ Hospitalization coverage for employee and direct dependents
